ygData.subject: Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.13
ygData.msgSnippet: For those who use it, my latest bard song calculator spreadsheet is available.  (It s an Excell spreadsheet that calculates numbers given level and
ygData.messageBody:
For those who use it, my latest bard song calculator spreadsheet is
available. (It's an Excell spreadsheet that calculates numbers given
level and instruments). It should be up at Rokenn's site shortly
(www.eqsongs.com) but until then, you can get it here:

http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html

The main changes are some more sets of numbers have been added, and
lots of song to song incompatibilities have been added. See the
Documentation sheet for details.

If you have any comments or modifications (or questions ;), please e-
mail me at eqreed@.... Enjoy!

- Reed Stormwind (54 bard of E'ci)
